pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍanakato hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.3_0: So sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā saṅghaṁ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.4_0: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghabhattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.8_1: āyasmā upanando sakyaputto tumhākaṁ sambhāvito kulūpako;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.8_2: yeneva hatthena saddhādeyyaṁ bhuñjati teneva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.9_0: So sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā saṅghaṁ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.10_0: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.12_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.13_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.14_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.17_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.19_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.20.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa āroceyya,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.8_0: cattāri ca pārājikāni, terasa ca saṅghādisesā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.10_0: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.12_0: āroceyya itthiyā vā purisassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.16_2: atthi bhikkhusammuti āpattipariyantā ca kulapariyantā ca,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.16_3: atthi bhikkhusammuti neva āpattipariyantā na kulapariyantā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.22_1: kulāni ca pariggahitāni honti— “ettakāhi āpattīhi ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.24_1: kulāni ca apariggahitāni honti— “ettakāhi āpattīhi ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.25.1_1: tā āpattiyo ṭhapetvā aññāhi āpattīhi āroceti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.26_1: tāni kulāni ṭhapetvā aññesu kulesu āroceti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.27_0: Āpattipariyante ca kulapariyante ca yā āpattiyo pariggahitāyo honti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.27_1: tā āpattiyo ṭhapetvā yāni kulāni pariggahitāni honti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.27_2: tāni kulāni ṭhapetvā aññāhi āpattīhi aññesu kulesu āroceti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.2.5_0: Anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṁ vā aduṭṭhullaṁ vā ajjhācāraṁ āroceti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
